description: This file is a Node.js script (CommonJS module) used to start a development environment for an Electron + Vite project. It launches the Vite dev server, waits until it's reachable, then starts Electron with the dev server URL passed via environment variable.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Helper function to spawn a child process with given command, arguments, and options. Returns the ChildProcess object; exits the parent process if the child process exits.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Asynchronous function that orchestrates starting the Vite dev server, waiting for it to be reachable with 'wait-on', then launching Electron pointing to the dev server URL. Handles process exit codes and errors.
